name: aMAZE
description: Maze is a straight-forward and surprisingly-difficult celebration of the simple beauty of the maze.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel or AMD 2 Ghz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel or AMD 2.1 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 60 MB available space
